snippet: The United States will not send a fleet to take part in naval exercises that China is hosting this month, military officials said Thursday.
abstract: United States will not send a fleet to take part in Chinese naval exercises after learning that China did not invite Japan.
lead_paragraph: The United States will not send a fleet to take part in naval exercises that China is hosting this month, military officials said Thursday.

headline.main: China: U.S. to Shun Joint Naval Drills
headline.print_headline: China: U.S. to Shun Joint Naval Drills
